member.name: T:JetBrains.Platform.VisualStudio.JustVs11.Shell.Hacks.HealOwnerlessFloatingWindowsJustVs11
member.summary: VS11 has a bug. Ownerless floating windows don't notify the main window on their activation, as a result the main VS MSO component is not activated and the command routing becomes broken. This component tries to fix that issue. It monitors VS floating windows activation and if they have no owner, notify the main VS window.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Platform.VisualStudio.JustVs11.Shell.Hacks.SuppressOwnerlessFloatingWindowsJustVs11
